issue.title: [Rust][DataFusion] Implement ANSI SQL Functions
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10969](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10969). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
There are not many ANSI SQL functions currently supported. This ticket is an umbrella for increasing the support.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10969?focusedCommentId=17253290) by Jorge Leitão (jorgecarleitao):*
